name: Twin Pines Mall
description: The Twin Pines Mall, a sprawling monument to consumerism, gleams under the Hill Valley sky. Its bright neon signs hum with an electric energy, illuminating a vast parking lot that seems to stretch to the horizon. This isn't just any mall; it's a place where dreams are bought and sold, where teenagers loiter, and where, under the cloak of night, extraordinary events involving plutonium, a DeLorean, and a bolt of lightning might just unfold. Or perhaps, it's the Lone Pine Mall now, depending on how history played out.
